Flow.description: GTMS-14163: BSO Project GTMS-16462: Added 3PF message screen to display message to users as part of 3PF project Phase 2 on 1/3/24 GTMS-16417: Added logic to map Finance partner for FPQ record based on Deal Desk criteria as part of 3PF Phase 2 project 1/12/24 GTMS-16418: Added logic to show error screen if FPQ exists for a related quote as part of 3PF Phase 2 project on 1/12/24 2/7/24: updated pending to pending under partner review while created Finance partner Quote record.. 2/8/24: Repaced oOpportunity.Balance_Due__c with Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c in X3PF_Account_Id Formula varaible. Reverted back Pending Under Partner Review change. Mapped FPQ record Currency with Qutoe currency 2/9/24: Adding 3PF Manual Partner Assignment Alert 2/15/24: Added fault paths for 3PF creation. Added Direct Annual and Upfront options as part of GTMS-28286

formulas.description: GTMS-16417: Created as part of 3PF Phase project
formulas.name: FPQ_Record_Link

formulas.description: GTMS-16417: Created as part of 3PF phase 3 project on 1/12/24
formulas.name: X3PF_Account_Id
formulas.expression: IF( {!oAccount.Account_Size_Segment__c} == "AE2/AE3" && NOT({!oAccount.X3PF_Customer__c}) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c})), IF( OR( {!Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c} < 30000, {!Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c} >= 55000 && {!Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c} < 80000, AND( OR( {!Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c} >= 30000 && {!Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c} < 55000, {!Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c} >= 80000 && {!Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c} < 300000, {!Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c} >= 300000 && {!Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c} < 600000 ), OR( {!checkCreditRating} == "yellow", {!checkCreditRating} == "Red" ) ) ),{!$Label.leafAccId}, IF({!checkCreditRating} != NULL && {!checkCreditRating} != '',{!$Label.TFCAccId}, '') ), IF( {!oAccount.Account_Size_Segment__c} == "ENT" && NOT({!oAccount.X3PF_Customer__c}) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_Quote.Balance_Due__c})), {!$Label.TFCAccId}, '' ) )

fields.name: Additional_Notes1
fields.fieldText: Do you have additional information youd like to send to the deal desk team?

fields.name: Apply_for_Financing
fields.fieldText: Apply for Financing
fields.helpText:
• 3rd Party Finance : No financials required for $250K-$350K, custom payment type, payment deferral available with commissions kicker.
  • Internal Financing : No custom payment type, payment required prior to shipping, less commission payout vs 3PF.

fields.name: greenValueDisclaimer
fields.fieldText: Customers credit profile: strong. 3rd Party Financing is highly recommended and approval is likely without financial statements. TCV > $250,000.00 may still require financials.

fields.name: yellowValueDisclaimer
fields.fieldText: Customers credit profile: medium. 3rd Party Financing is recommended; high likelihood of approval. 3PF may require additional information (financials, PG from ownership, and/or additional credit items). Direct Monthly Financing will require last 2 years financial statements are required: Balance Sheets & Income statements.

fields.name: DisclaimerRed
fields.fieldText: Customers credit profile: distressed. Please submit for 3rd Party Finance review. 3PF likely to require additional information (financials, PG from ownership, and/or additional credit items). Direct Monthly Financing will require both Finance approval on blended discount, and last 2 years financial statements are required: Balance Sheets & Income statements

fields.name: OppOnlyUpdateCheckBox
fields.fieldText: Are the requested Payment Types an exception? If this box is checked then the Selcted Payment Type for the Opportunity will not roll up to the Account

fields.name: Billing_Address_Issue
fields.fieldText: ERROR: Please provide a valid Billing Address for this Account

Click "Next" to request an increase the Max Upfront Credit Limit.

This account is not yet approved to transact with a Maximum Credit limit. This will allow the customer to transact with approved Net Terms.

Click "Next" to request Max Upfront Credit Limit from the Credit Team.

fields.name: Mid_Market_Issue

fields.name: UpdateErrorConfirmation
fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: newIFR_stopFlow_Choice
fields.fieldText: Please select an option and click Next to proceed further:

fields.name: PFmessage
fields.fieldText:
Thank you - your Application was submitted successfully. Please look for an updated response via email. 


You may look for any and all 3PF decisions on the FPQ object on your Salesforce opportunity along with an email response. Internal decisions will be sent via email and you can also reference the Customer account level for approval information.

fields.name: ErrorSelection
fields.fieldText: Kindly select an option. To proceed further.

fields.name: Shipping_handling_salestax
fields.fieldText: Error: Shipping and handling or sales tax is not up to date. Please add a shipping address and contact. Both shipping and handling and sales tax needs to be calculated before submitting to deal desk.

fields.name: Error3

defaultValue.stringValue: Finance Partners are only available in the US & Canada currently

fields.fieldText: Error

fields.name: US_CA_ERROR
fields.fieldText: ERROR: Finance Partners are only available in the US & Canada currently

fields.name: i3PFInsurancePartnerMessageText
fields.fieldText: Since this deal is tagged with a subsidy partner, you cannot implement 3PF, and will not be able to proceed with the quote. Please return to opportunity

textTemplates.description: GTMS-16417: created as part of 3PF phase 2 project
textTemplates.name: X3PFManualAssignmentTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Hello Deal Desk,


{!GET_New_FPQ_Record.Name} has been submitted by {!GET_New_FPQ_Record.CreatedBy.FirstName} {!GET_New_FPQ_Record.CreatedBy.LastName} but requires manual assignment to a 3PF Partner. Please update the FPQ with the appropriate Finance Partner and submit the FPQ for review in the Finance Partner Portal.


Link to FPQ: {!FPQ_Record_Link}


Thank you,
